description: This file defines an Android ViewModel for editing Notes, including load and save functionality, and a factory class for its creation.

classes.name: EditNoteViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel responsible for loading, editing, and saving a single Note.

classes.name: EditNoteViewModelFactory
classes.description: A factory class for creating instances of EditNoteViewModel with dependency injection.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads a note by its ID and updates LiveData.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves a note, either creating a new one or updating an existing one.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates an instance of EditNoteViewModel, checking for the correct class type.
